select ec.*, es.title as subjectParentName, es2.title as subjectName, et.name as teacherName from edu_course ec left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left join edu_subject es on ec.subject_parent_id = es.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
